reviews.review: Игра норм, но до сих пор гребаные читеры , даже на праймах
It's a good game, and it takes i while to get good at it. But if you try you will most likely succeed
you need friends to play with
неплохая, интересная игра с большим кол-вом читеров.

The game has its own history and a huge number of players, but everything that happens inside leaves much to be desired, namely the work of anti-cheat and similar services in general, which turns it into unplayable shit, so I can not recommend matchmaking for a comfortable game. We ask everyone else who is not averse to checking their nerves.

upd: Nothing has changed
good game to learn and have fun

Personal review:

After 900+ h in CS:GO i can say it is a good game. Im playing just with friends and it keeps me in tension sometimes. 
This is different than Source or 1.6 (used to play lot of CS 1.6 before)
Sometimes cs will take you to the toxic players and cheaters who have no reason to cheat.
банят за все подряд и без разбора
